org.corfudb.security.tls

Class ReloadableTrustManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.corfudb.security.tls.ReloadableTrustManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TrustManager, X509TrustManager

    public class ReloadableTrustManager
extends Object
implements X509TrustManager
    This trust manager reloads the trust store whenever a checkClientTrusted or checkServerTrusted is called. Created by zjohnny on 9/18/17.

                       throws SSLException
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        trustStorePath - Location of trust store.
